ai-patthana20.9:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana20.9:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for refuge.
ai-patthana20.9:2.1_0: Nor causes and conditions for the arising of thought.
ai-patthana20.9:4.1_0: for the sake of letting go, two results, together with the five results of deeds ...
ai-patthana20.9:5.1_0: There is no principle for the sake of refuge.
ai-patthana20.9:6.1_0: for the sake of investigating, but not for the sake of fun.
ai-patthana20.9:6.1_1: Four kinds of raised by the kings,
ai-patthana20.9:6.1_2: He should not do two deeds.
ai-patthana20.9:6.1_3: He doesn’t have the bathing, going to the Buddhist sect, nor a single straight path ...
ai-patthana20.9:8.1_0: It’s not the cause or condition for the teachings.
ai-patthana20.9:9.1_0: It’s not the cause or condition for the teachings.
ai-patthana20.9:9.1_1: It’s not the cause or condition for the teachings.
ai-patthana20.9:9.1_2: It’s not the cause or condition for the teachings that leads to listen.
ai-patthana20.9:10.1_0: It’s not the Teaching that you have no refuge.
ai-patthana20.9:10.1_1: It’s not the Teaching that has no refuge.
ai-patthana20.9:11.1_0: It’s not the case that someone’s refuge is a reason for the teaching.
ai-patthana20.9:11.1_1: It’s not the Teaching that you have no refuge for the Teaching.
ai-patthana20.9:12.1_0: You relieve on the four supports. Plants on the basis for ending the four supports. ...
ai-patthana20.9:12.1_1: ... the five sense faculties, who are born, and has been born in, and, up to four noble truths; two, three, four, five, ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, a hundred, a thousand, a hundred thousand.
ai-patthana20.9:13.1_0: You don’t have a cause of what’s the reason for speaking the teachings, for what they need.
ai-patthana20.9:14.1_1: He should not look down on other than five other things. ...
ai-patthana20.9:14.1_3: No to scratch the four continents,
ai-patthana20.9:15.1_0: (This should be expanded as in the same way.)
